name: Rise of Ages
description: Rise of Ages is a sandbox game, allowing you to explore, build, found cities, make wars and evolve technologies to reach the highest level of a civilization and then travel to other planets! The game begins in prehistory and will advance ages, one by one, as the player evolves.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 or superior 处理器: DualCore 2.0 GHz 内存: 3 GB RAM 图形: Intel HD Graphics 620 or similar DirectX 版本: 11 存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 or superior 处理器: DualCore 2.8 GHz 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: GeForce GT 730 or similar DirectX 版本: 11 存储空间: 需要 3 GB 可用空间
